name: The Crazy Wizard
description:
This is a game I made out to experiment, learn and improve my skills in game development. I think I have done a good job even if I used pre-included assets.

The plot is simple: you are a generic hero who wants to enter the tower of a wizard to steal his knowledge. He spots you and punishes you. Since I don't want to give out any spoiler, I'll let the main antagonist tell you the rest.

This game may look easy to win but I promise, it will be surprisingly challenging.

Have a good game!

Instructions:

  1. Download the .exe file
  2. Double click on the .exe file to install the game
  3. Play the game
